other_tests.findings: Tricuspid-valve thickening, with a large, mobile echodense mass; no vegetations on the aortic, mitral, or pulmonic valves; mild tricuspid regurgitation.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Transesophageal echocardiography on hospital day 4 confirmed two echodense masses on the tricuspid valve measuring 14 mm by 9 mm and 12 mm by 10 mm.

other_tests.findings: No aortic or mitral valve disease; confirmed presence of two separate echodense masses on the tricuspid valve.
Nine of 10 blood cultures grew S. aureus.
